snippet: Troy Matteson followed an opening round 61 with a less spectacular but solid second day, carding a three-under 68 to hold a one-shot lead at the midway point of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill.
abstract: Troy Matteson takes second-round lead at the John Deere Classic golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Troy Matteson followed an opening round 61 with a less spectacular but solid second day, carding a three-under 68 to hold a one-shot lead at the midway point of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill.

headline.seo: Matteson Maintains Lead at John Deere Classic
headline.main: Matteson Maintains Lead at John Deere Classic
